name: ebmeds-docker
description: Gather EBMeDS microservices, build their Docker containers and launch them in Swarm mode.

scripts.docker:stop: docker service rm ebmeds_engine ebmeds_api-gateway ebmeds_kibana ebmeds_logstash ebmeds_elasticsearch ebmeds_coaching
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:stop; npm run docker:start

author: Ville Lindholm
